title: Add Cancer Care service package to the catalog

requirements.text: Pre-populate the backend service catalog with a new Cancer Care service package so it appears in the Services list and can be booked like other services.
acceptanceCriteria: Calling getServices() returns a Service entry whose name clearly indicates Cancer Care (for example, "Cancer Care Package"), with a non-empty English description and a non-zero pricePerVisit.
The new Cancer Care service can be opened via getService(serviceId) without trapping.
A booking request can be successfully submitted (requestBooking) for the Cancer Care service and appears in getUserBookings for the caller.

constraints: Keep all backend logic in the existing single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo); do not introduce additional backend services.

Do not edit any frontend files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implementing specialized cancer-treatment workflows, clinician assignment, medical record storage, or tele-consultation features.
Adding third-party integrations (payments, SMS, email, analytics).
Changing the overall UI theme or navigation beyond what is required for the service to appear and be bookable.
